message.content:
{
  "derived_taxonomy": {
    "Platform Content Moderation Actions": [
      "Content removal and takedowns",
      "Account, channel and page bans/suspensions",
      "Policy tightening and enforcement changes",
      "Demonetization, ad removals and ad policy actions",
      "Recommendation and ranking algorithm changes",
      "Misinformation labeling, fact-check partnerships and warning labels",
      "Automated detection and moderation system use"
    ],
    "Human Oversight, Appeals & Workforce Measures": [
      "Appeals, re-review and reinstatement processes",
      "Hiring, training and scaling of human moderators/reviewers",
      "Human-in-the-loop verification and manual adjudication",
      "Workforce protections, accommodations and reviewer well‑being",
      "Operational rules and termination policies for human operators"
    ],
    "Autonomous Vehicles & Mobility System Responses": [
      "Crash investigations, data sharing and NTSB/NHTSA reporting",
      "Testing suspensions, permits revoked and regional bans",
      "Software updates, recalls and feature disablements",
      "Operational changes (halt/resume tests, end programs)",
      "AV-specific legal charges, civil suits and prosecutions"
    ],
    "Facial Recognition & Biometric Responses": [
      "Bans, restrictions and local/federal policy changes",
      "Legal actions, class settlements and mandated remedies",
      "Opt-outs, user controls and privacy settings for biometrics",
      "Corporate apologies, data deletion and remedial actions",
      "Technical audits, algorithm improvements and accuracy reviews"
    ],
    "Algorithmic Bias Research, Mitigation & Evaluation": [
      "Debiasing methods, metrics and algorithmic interventions",
      "Bias evaluation studies, benchmarks and crowd evaluations",
      "Dataset curation, training-data improvements and filtering",
      "Model fine-tuning, mitigation experiments and prompts",
      "Recommendations for fairness analyses before deployment"
    ],
    "Legal, Regulatory & Investigative Actions": [
      "Government investigations and regulator inquiries",
      "Lawsuits, class actions and court-ordered remedies",
      "Legislative, regulatory mandates and policy reforms",
      "Settlements, consent decrees and mandated operational changes"
    ],
    "Product & Technical Remediation": [
      "Software patches, hotfixes and over-the-air updates",
      "Feature rollbacks, disablements and temporary halts",
      "Red-teaming, limited releases and staged access",
      "Root-cause analysis, bug fixes and additional testing",
      "Public technical follow-ups (model cards, risk statements)"
    ],
    "Privacy, Data Sharing & Data Protection Measures": [
      "Revisions to data-sharing agreements and access limits",
      "User opt-outs, in-product privacy controls and disclosures",
      "Investigations and responses to data breaches or leaks",
      "Data deletion, retention changes and provenance clarifications"
    ],
    "Workplace & Operational Safety Measures": [
      "Investments in physical safety and health protocols",
      "Operational process changes and safety training",
      "Incident response, medical treatment and evacuation",
      "Staffing, rotation and temporary light‑duty programs",
      "Contractor management, audits and vendor changes"
    ],
    "Education & Assessment Systems Responses": [
      "Proctoring software discontinuation and university policies",
      "Appeals, manual review and human proctor interventions",
      "Grading algorithm adjustments, appeals and remedial exams",
      "Admissions and applicant‑evaluation system rollbacks",
      "Legal challenges and court-ordered transparency in education"
    ],
    "Accessibility & Anti-Discrimination Measures": [
      "Removal of discriminatory targeting and ad options",
      "Algorithmic changes to reduce accessibility and bias harms",
      "Independent audits, advocacy and expert consultations",
      "Restitution, policy changes and product adjustments for inclusion"
    ],
    "Research, Editorial & Incident Classification Actions": [
      "Incident reclassification, downgrades and criteria updates",
      "Publication corrections, republications and editorial notes",
      "Independent audits, reproduction studies and code reviews",
      "Migration/re-association of reports and contextual re-labeling"
    ],
    "Crisis Communications, Apologies & Public Statements": [
      "Public apologies and corporate regret statements",
      "Customer compensation, refunds and remedial offers",
      "Proactive public information, warnings and advisories",
      "PR responses to investigations, journalists and regulators"
    ],
    "Platform Safety for Health & Self-harm": [
      "Content removal and redirection to helplines/support resources",
      "Bans on promotion of dangerous challenges and products",
      "Algorithm training to detect and reduce self-harm content",
      "Partnerships with health organizations and helplines"
    ],
    "Corporate Governance, Ethics & Transparency": [
      "Establishment of ethics boards, advisory panels and auditors",
      "Transparency measures: model cards, disclosures and reports",
      "Internal policy changes, principles and code-of-conduct updates",
      "Third-party assessments, independent reviews and advisory input"
    ]
  }
}

{
  "derived_taxonomy": {
    "Investigations and Regulatory Actions": [
      "Government probes and agency investigations",
      "Regulatory inspections and compliance inquiries",
      "Internal organizational investigations"
    ],
    "Legal Actions and Litigation": [
      "Civil lawsuits and class actions",
      "Employment, tribunal and individual legal claims",

      "Apologies and mea culpas",

      "Public denials, defenses and reputational statements"
    ],

      "Safety feature and product design updates",

      "Privacy, data-retention and notice changes",
      "User-facing controls, opt-outs and preference settings",
      "Ranking, recommendation and discovery algorithm changes"
    ],

      "Content takedowns and removals",
      "Account suspensions, bans and restrictions",
      "Appeals, restorations and human review outcomes",

    ],
    "Transparency, Data-sharing and Disclosure": [

      "Release of research, methods and reproducibility artifacts"
    ],

      "Human-in-the-loop requirements and manual review",
      "Ethics advisory boards, resignations and statements",
      "Reviewer qualifications, training and governance protocols"
    ],
    "Incident Response and Safety Operations": [
      "Immediate on-scene and emergency actions",
      "Coordination with first responders and investigators",
      "Evidence collection, data-log recovery and forensics"
    ],
    "Algorithmic and Technical Mitigations": [
      "Filtering, classifiers and content-detection tweaks",
      "Model updates, retraining, fine-tuning and de-biasing",
      "Prompting, temperature and runtime control measures",
      "Sensor, threshold and detection-parameter adjustments"
    ],
    "Access Restrictions, Pauses and Removals": [
      "Restricting or removing model/demo access on platforms",
      "Pausing, canceling or halting pilots and deployments",
      "Removing projects, apps or services from marketplaces"
    ],
    "Enforcement Outcomes, Settlements and Fines": [
      "Monetary settlements and payout arrangements",
      "Regulatory fines, penalties and court-ordered remedies",
      "Consent decrees and mandated compliance actions"
    ],
    "Community, Advocacy and Civil Society Actions": [
      "Advocacy campaigns, petitions and moratoria calls",
      "Public protests, community campaigns and petitions",
      "NGO investigations, mapping and public-interest projects"
    ],
    "Testing, Auditing and Research Findings": [
      "Independent academic and investigative audits",
      "Internal testing, QA, bug fixes and mitigation pilots",
      "Crowdsourced audits, journalism and reproducibility studies"
    ],
    "Operational and Organizational Changes": [
      "Staffing changes, resignations and leadership actions",
      "Policy, procedure and process reviews and reforms",
      "Operational workflow changes, escalation and reporting"
    ],
    "Support, Compensation and Remedies for Affected Individuals": [
      "Victim compensation, refunds and monetary remedies",
      "Offers of therapy, support services and restitution",
      "Account restoration, access remediation and corrective actions"
    ]
  }
}

{
  "derived_taxonomy": {
    "Content removal and account enforcement": [
      "Remove specific content (posts, videos, images, ads)",
      "Suspend, ban or terminate accounts/pages/channels",
      "Demonetize or remove channels from monetization",
      "Disable or restrict advertising and ad accounts"
    ],
    "Service and feature shutdowns or rollbacks": [
      "Take demo/model/service offline or disable access",
      "Limit or phase rollout of problematic features",
      "Remove apps or features from stores/platforms",
      "Shut down specific bots/services"
    ],
    "Policy updates and prohibitions": [
      "Update or create content and safety policies",
      "Prohibit specific high-risk uses or categories",
      "Introduce ad targeting and advertising restrictions",
      "Temporary bans or moratoria on AI-generated content"
    ],
    "Moderation systems and review processes": [
      "Deploy or refine automated moderation/filters",
      "Implement manual review and human moderation",
      "Create secondary or redundant moderation layers",
      "Establish community-moderation channels or guidance"
    ],
    "Technical fixes, patches and recalls": [
      "Patch software bugs and fix functional glitches",
      "Fix security vulnerabilities and invalidate exposed keys",
      "Issue software updates and over-the-air fixes",
      "Voluntary recalls or remedial deployments"
    ],
    "Investigations, audits and inquiries": [
      "Internal company investigations and fact-finding",
      "Regulatory or government investigations and probes",
      "Third-party or independent audits and studies",
      "Law enforcement criminal investigations"
    ],
    "Legal actions, regulatory orders and settlements": [
      "Lawsuits and class-action filings",
      "Regulatory orders, bans and emergency measures",
      "Fines, penalties and settlement agreements",
      "Legislative proposals and new statutory rules"
    ],
    "Detection, forensic and verification tools": [
      "AI-generated content classifiers and detectors",
      "Synthetic voice and voice-clone detection tools",
      "Image and audio forensic analysis tools",
      "Hashing/reporting to child-protection or abuse databases"
    ],
    "Transparency, corrections and public communications": [
      "Issue corrections, retractions and content updates",
      "Publish public statements, explanations and apologies",
      "Disclose incident findings, post-mortems and reports",
      "Add provenance/attribution disclosures and byline changes"
    ],
    "Collaboration, reporting and information sharing": [
      "Share findings with other platforms, governments or agencies",
      "Report abuse or evidence to law enforcement/authorities",
      "Coordinate with researchers, NGOs and industry partners",
      "Form or participate in cross‑platform/regulatory working groups"
    ],
    "User protection, support and education": [
      "Provide hotlines, support resources and safety help",
      "Offer user controls, opt-outs and moderation tools",
      "Run user education, warnings and guidance campaigns",
      "Provide refunds, compensation or subscription remedies"
    ],
    "Operational and organizational responses": [
      "Create internal task forces, response teams or working groups",
      "Staffing actions, disciplinary measures or executive departures",
      "Pause or suspend programs and partnerships pending review",
      "Training, guidance and updated operating procedures"
    ],
    "Data access controls and governance": [
      "Restrict or shut off API and data-stream access",
      "Block scraping and limit third-party data harvesting",
      "Enforce data deletion, retention or privacy controls",
      "Limit or stop specific data processing for compliance"
    ],
    "Labeling, watermarking and in‑product disclosures": [
      "Apply visible watermarks or on-screen 'Deep Fake' marks",
      "Require or add AI‑generated / synthetic media labels",
      "Display in‑product disclaimers about AI accuracy or limits",
      "Add explicit consent/advertiser disclosure requirements"
    ]
  }
}

}
